description:
A world where fairies possess and reside within animals, granting them special powers. By surgically removing and transplanting the organs of a possessed animal into a human, humans can partially summon the fairy and use it as a weapon. Eventually, such individuals were used for war, and were called "Fairy Soldiers." After a long war, these soldiers lost their purpose, and had to reintegrate into society. From the government, to the mafia, and even becoming terrorists, each tread their own path.

The story begins nine years after the end of the war, and centers on the protagonist Maria. Maria is a fresh recruit of "Dorothea," an organization dedicated to the investigation and suppression of fairy-related crimes and incidents. Even in peacetime, the government is still unstable after the war. Many criminals still have lingering wounds from the previous conflict, and there are terrorist groups bent on revenge. This is the story of Fairy Soldiers seeking their own justice in a chaotic postwar world.

(Source: Anime News Network)

tags.name: Primarily Adult Cast
tags.description: Main cast is mostly composed of characters above a high school age.

tags.name: Military
tags.description: Centered around the life and activities of military personnel.

tags.name: War
tags.description: Partly or completely set during wartime.

tags.name: CGI
tags.description: Prominently features scenes created with computer-generated imagery.

tags.name: Politics
tags.description: Centers around politics, politicians, or government activities.

tags.name: Magic
tags.description: Prominently features magical elements or the use of magic.

tags.name: Guns
tags.description: Prominently features the use of guns in combat.

tags.name: Steampunk
tags.description: Prominently features technology and designs inspired by 19th-century industrial steam-powered machinery.

tags.name: Swordplay
tags.description: Prominently features the use of swords in combat.

tags.name: Espionage
tags.description: Prominently features characters infiltrating an organization in order to steal sensitive information.

tags.name: Foreign
tags.description: Partly or completely set in a country outside the country of origin.

tags.name: Fairy
tags.description: Prominently features a character who is a fairy.

tags.name: Urban Fantasy
tags.description: Set in a world similar to the real world, but with the existence of magic or other supernatural elements.

tags.name: Mafia
tags.description: Centered around Italian organised crime syndicates.

tags.name: Terrorism
tags.description: Centers around the activities of a terrorist or terrorist organization.

tags.name: Revenge
tags.description: Prominently features a character who aims to exact punishment in a resentful or vindictive manner.

__Website__ | __Twitter__ Date of Birth: April 2, 1992 Birthplace: Kumamoto Prefecture __Ayaka Tachibana__ is a Japanese singer-songwriter and vocalist. She is currently a vocalist for the creative music unit (K)NoW_NAME.

[Wiki (jp)](https://ja.wikipedia.org/wiki/明田川仁)

Affiliated with Magic Capsule, a recording studio led by his father [Susumu Aketagawa](https://anilist.co/staff/120062).

[Twitter](https://twitter.com/makoto_myzk) | [Wiki (jp)](https://ja.wikipedia.org/wiki/宮崎誠)

A music creator for the creative music unit [(K)NoW_NAME](https://anilist.co/staff/126602/).
__Profile (Verygoo)__ | __Twitter__ __Shuuhei Mutsuki__ is a Japanese composer and orchestrator. He is also a music creator for the creative music unit (K)NoW_NAME.

**[Twitter](https://twitter.com/editzhirose)** | **[Website](http://www.editz.jp/)**

**Hirose Kiyoshi** is a Japanese editor and film editor.

[Twitter](https://twitter.com/veryjumbogoo)

Music director, composer, and producer affiliated with VERYGOO.
Masaya Saitou is a producer and publicity manager.

[Twitter](https://twitter.com/michi1020)

Mitsuhito Tsuji is a producer for P.A. Works.
Chidori Hayashi is the representative director of Medicos Entertainment.

[Twitter](https://twitter.com/horiken2000)

Founder and representative director of [P.A. Works](https://anilist.co/studio/132/).

Hiroo Maruyama is a producer working for Mainichi Broadcasting System (MBS).

He joined Mainichi Broadcasting in 1999. Was transferred later to the Tokyo office and took over duties relating to the production of animation broadcasts. He was responsible for production on series like Gundam Seed, Gundam Seed Destiny and Full Metal Alchemist, all part of the 6:00pm Saturday timeblock, which gained wide popularity.
**Akito Takahashi** is a publicity producer working for Toho.
